original_text: I will count you one by one, as a shepherd counts his sheep. I will cause you to obey the rules of my covenant with you.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 막대기 아래로 지나가게 하며 언약의 줄로 매려니와

sentences.original_text: I will count you one by one
as a shepherd counts his sheep
I will cause you to obey the rules
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 규칙을 순종하게 할 것이다
